name: Wielka Improwizacja
description:
This is short game made for "Jam in the theathre" in Poznan (Poland).
Game is designed for 2 players

Main goal of the game is to show correctly the show.
Players can collect points by picking up flowers
If the audience is not happy then they will throw tomatoes.
When the audience is happy enought the show will ends and the winner is player with higher score. Other way both players will lose

Controls:
Its highly reccomended to play on two Xbox Pads

Player 1
WSAD - movement
TGFH - dance moves

Player2
OLK: - movement
Arrows - dance moves
